properties.title: Gold Price Reaches All-Time High
properties.summary: The price of gold has reached an all-time high of $4,644.56 per ounce, surpassing December’s previous peak of $4,383.76.
properties.event_text: The price of gold reaches an all-time high of US$4,644.56 per ounce, surpassing December’s previous peak of $4,383.76.

properties.title: Sikhio Train Disaster
properties.summary: At least 32 people are killed and 66 others are injured when a construction crane falls onto a passing train in Sikhio district, Nakhon Ratchasima province, Thailand.
properties.place: Sikhio district, Nakhon Ratchasima province, Thailand
properties.event_text: Disasters and accidents: 2026 Sikhio train disaster At least 32 people are killed and 66 others are injured when a construction crane falls onto a passing train in Sikhio district , Nakhon Ratchasima province , Thailand . (Sky News) (Reuters) (AP)

properties.title: France Opens Consulate in Greenland
properties.summary: French foreign minister Jean-Noël Barrot announced that France will open a consulate in Greenland on February 6, claiming it is a 'political signal' rejecting US attempts to acquire the territory.
properties.event_text: International relations: Denmark–France relations French foreign minister Jean-Noël Barrot announces that France will open a consulate in Greenland on February 6, saying it is a "political signal" that France rejects attempts by the United States to acquire the territory . (AFP via Le Monde )

properties.title: Travel Bans Under Trump Administration
properties.summary: The United States will suspend the processing of immigrant visas for 75 countries, including tourist and business visas.
properties.event_text: International relations: Travel bans under the Trump administrations The United States announces it will suspend the processing of immigrant visas for 75 countries. Tourist and business visas will not be affected. (AFP via Le Monde )

properties.title: Iranian Protests: High Death Toll Reported

properties.title: Armed conflicts and attacks: Insurgency in Chad
properties.summary: At least six people are killed, including three soldiers and three attackers, in clashes between a rebel group and the Chadian National Army in Korbol , Moyen-Chari , Chad.
properties.event_text: Armed conflicts and attacks: Insurgency in Chad At least six people are killed, including three soldiers and three attackers, and 12 others are injured, including two other attackers, in clashes between a rebel group and the Chadian National Army in Korbol , Moyen-Chari , Chad. (Africanews)

properties.title: Adelaide Writers' Week Boycott Following Author Withdrawal
properties.summary: Adelaide Writers' Week has cancelled its 2026 festival following director Louise Adler’s resignation and the withdrawal of over 180 writers protesting a decision to disinvite Palestinian author Randa Abdel-Fattah.
properties.event_text: Arts and culture: Adelaide Writers' Week boycott Adelaide Writers' Week in Adelaide , Australia , cancels its 2026 festival after director Louise Adler resigned and more than 180 writers withdrew in protest over the board's decision to disinvite Palestinian Australian author Randa Abdel-Fattah . (Reuters)

properties.title: Argentine Inflation Rate Drops to 31.5%
properties.summary: Argentina records a 31.5% annual inflation rate in December, the lowest end-year level since 2017.
properties.event_text: Business and economy: 2018–present Argentine monetary crisis Argentina records a 31.5% annual inflation rate in December, the lowest end-year level since 2017, while monthly prices rise 2.8%, driven mainly by transport , housing, and fuel . (AFP via Barron's )

properties.title: Law and crime: Mexican drug war

properties.event_text: Law and crime: Mexican drug war , Mexico–Venezuela relations Mexican police arrest six alleged Tren de Aragua members operating in Mexico City on charges of drug trafficking , extortion , and human trafficking . (AP)

properties.title: Ugandan General Election: Internet Shutdown and Misinformation
properties.summary: Uganda has ordered a nationwide internet shutdown two days before its general election, citing concerns about misinformation and incitement. The communications regulator directs service providers to suspend access.

properties.title: Taoiseach Martin Meets with Attorney General on Deepfake Concerns
properties.summary: The Taoiseach Micheál Martin has announced a meeting with the Attorney General Rossa Fanning regarding the use of the Grok chatbot for generating sexually explicit images of women and minors.
properties.event_text: Science and technology: Sexual deepfake and illegal content generation on X Taoiseach Micheál Martin announces that he will meet with the Attorney General of Ireland Rossa Fanning about the Grok chatbot being used to produce sexually explicit images of women and minors. (RTÉ)

properties.title: Assassination of Hamas Leader in Gaza

properties.title: Myanmar Civil War: Detentions of Arakan Rohingya Salvation Army Members
properties.summary: Armed conflicts and attacks: Myanmar civil war, Bangladesh–Myanmar relations. Bangladesh detains 53 Arakan Rohingya Salvation Army members that crossed into Bangladesh amid fighting with the Arakan Army in Rakhine State.

properties.title: Spanish Prime Minister Tightens Rent Regulations
properties.summary: Pedro Sánchez issued a decree that tightens rent regulations, limiting short-term rentals and offering tax refunds to landlords renewing contracts without increases.
properties.event_text: Business and economy: Spanish property bubble Spanish prime minister Pedro Sánchez issues a decree that tightens rent regulations by limiting short-term rentals and offering full tax refunds to landlords who renew contracts without rent increases, as the country faces a housing shortfall of about 500,000 homes and average rents that have doubled over the past decade. (Reuters)

properties.title: Climate Change Brings Relief to Morocco
properties.summary: A seven-year drought ends in Morocco after a 95 percent increase in winter rainfall.
properties.event_text: A seven-year drought ends in Morocco after a 95 percent increase in winter rainfall compared with 2025 was recorded.

properties.title: Somali-UAE Relations Strain as Governments Dispute Port Access
properties.summary: International relations: Somalia–United Arab Emirates relations, focusing on a constitutional crisis and disputes over port access in Berbera, Bosaso, and Kismayo.
properties.place: Berbera, Somalia, United Arab Emirates, Somaliland, Bosaso, Kismayo
properties.event_text: International relations: Somalia–United Arab Emirates relations Constitutional crisis in Somalia Cabinets of the Federal Government of Somalia claim to repel the United Arab Emirates from operating in the ports of Berbera , Bosaso , and Kismayo for their support of Somaliland . The Somaliland, Puntland , and Jubaland governments subsequently dismiss the decision. (Middle East Eye) (Dawan Africa) (The New Arab)

properties.title: Corruption in Georgia
properties.summary: Former Georgian prime minister Irakli Garibashvili pleads guilty to large-scale money-laundering charges and receives a five-year prison sentence and a $1 million fine.
properties.event_text: investigators seize about $6.5 million in cash during raids on his residence.

properties.title: Corruption in Poland: Ziobro Receives Political Asylum
properties.summary: Former Polish justice minister Zbigniew Ziobro receives political asylum in Hungary while Polish prosecutors investigate him on 26 counts related to alleged misuse of a crime victims fund and other abuses of office under the first Morawiecki cabinet.
properties.event_text: Law and crime: Corruption in Poland , Hungary–Poland relations Former Polish justice minister Zbigniew Ziobro receives political asylum in Hungary while Polish prosecutors investigate him on 26 counts related to alleged misuse of a crime victims fund and other abuses of office under the first Morawiecki cabinet . ( The Guardian )

properties.title: Swedish Police Seize Record Amount of Cocaine
properties.summary: Swedish police seized three tonnes of cocaine from a shipping container at the Port of Helsingborg, making it the country's largest seizure of the illegal drug.
properties.event_text: Law and crime: War on drugs Swedish police seize three tonnes of cocaine found in a shipping container from South America at the Port of Helsingborg , making it the country 's single-largest seizure of the illegal drug . (Reuters) Spanish police , in coordination with the UK National Crime Agency and the US DEA , seize 10 tonnes of cocaine hidden among a cargo of salt on a cargo ship off the Canary Islands . It is the country 's largest ever seizure of drugs at sea. Thirteen people on board the vessel are arrested. ( The Guardian )

properties.title: Venezuela Releases Political Prisoners
properties.summary: Venezuela has released between 41 and 116 political prisoners who were detained due to acts associated with civil disobedience.
properties.event_text: Law and crime: Venezuela releases between 41 and 116 political prisoners who were detained due to acts associated with civil disobedience the constitutional order.

properties.title: Iranian Protests: Injuries Reported, Internet Blackout Occurs
properties.summary: Armed conflicts and attacks: 2025–2026 Iranian protests. Two people are injured in a suspected vehicle-ramming attack when a U-Haul truck strikes multiple people during an anti-Iranian government protest in Los Angeles , California , United States , after protesters strike the vehicle with hands and flags. No one is hospitalized after the incident.
properties.event_text: Armed conflicts and attacks: 2025–2026 Iranian protests 2026 Los Angeles ramming attack Two people are injured in a suspected vehicle-ramming attack when a U-Haul truck strikes multiple people during an anti-Iranian government protest in Los Angeles , California , United States , after protesters strike the vehicle with hands and flags. No one is hospitalized after the incident. (BNO News) Non-governmental organization HRAI verifies the deaths of 483 protesters and 47 security personnel in Iran since the start of the protests. (Sky News) (Reuters) Amidst the ongoing internet blackout , the Iranian government successfully shuts down the Starlink internet for the first time. ( The Times of Israel )

properties.title: Sudanese Civil War: Government Returns to Khartoum

properties.title: Arts and culture: 83rd Golden Globe Awards

properties.event_text: Arts and culture: 83rd Golden Globe Awards At this year's Golden Globe Awards , Hamnet and One Battle After Another win Best Dramatic and Best Comedic or Musical Film , respectively, while The Pitt and The Studio win Best Drama and Best Comedy or Musical in television, respectively. ( Los Angeles Times )

properties.title: Armed Conflicts and Attacks: Crisis in Venezuela

properties.title: Argentina-Brazil Relations
properties.summary: Argentina and Brazil are discussing relations following the expulsion of Argentine diplomats under the Nicolás Maduro administration. Brazil is taking responsibility for diplomatic representation and custody of the Argentine embassy in Venezuela.
properties.event_text: International relations: Argentina–Brazil relations , Argentina–Venezuela relations , International reactions to the 2026 United States intervention in Venezuela Brazil returns responsibility to Argentina for its diplomatic representation and custody of the Argentine embassy in Venezuela after overseeing the mission in Caracas since 2024 following the expulsion of Argentine diplomats under the Nicolás Maduro administration . (Reuters)

properties.title: Egyptian Parliamentary Election Finalized
properties.summary: The National Elections Authority has finalized the remaining parliamentary seats, confirming that President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi's allies retain the two-thirds supermajority needed to amend the constitution. Opposition parties and independents hold approximately 158 of 568 elected seats.
properties.event_text: Politics and elections: 2025 Egyptian parliamentary election Egypt 's National Elections Authority finalizes the remaining 49 parliamentary seats, confirming that President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi 's allies retain the two-thirds supermajority needed to amend the constitution , while opposition parties and independents hold about 158 of 568 elected seats. (Reuters)

properties.title: Nicaragua Releases Prisoners After US Demands Release of Political Prisoners
properties.summary: Nicaragua releases dozens of prisoners following a public demand from the United States to release more than 60 political prisoners.
properties.event_text: Politics and elections: Nicaragua–United States relations Nicaragua releases dozens of prisoners after the United States publicly demanded the release of more than 60 political prisoners . (Al Jazeera)

properties.title: Honduran Election: Key Details Revealed
properties.summary: The Honduran general election is expected to be finalized with the confirmed results and transfer of power, despite President Xiomara Castro's decree for a recount.
properties.event_text: Politics and elections: 2025 Honduran general election The Chief of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the Honduran Armed Forces Héctor Valerio informs that the already confirmed election results and the transfer of power would be guaranteed despite President Xiomara Castro 's decree demanding a recount of the results. ( Tiempo )

properties.title: Indonesia Suspens Access to Chatbot Due to Pornography Concerns
properties.summary: The Science and technology agency in Indonesia has suspended access to the Grok chatbot after concerns about generating pornographic content. Representatives of xAI, the developer, have been summoned for investigation.
properties.event_text: Suspension of access to the Grok chatbot due to concerns about pornography generation.

properties.title: US Military Seizes Timor-Leste Oil Tanker
properties.summary: Armed conflicts and attacks: Operation Southern Spear, United States oil blockade during Operation Southern Spear, Timor-Leste–United States relations The United States military seizes a Timor-Leste -flagged oil tanker in the Caribbean Sea , marking the fifth tanker seized as part of the blockade.
properties.event_text: The Guardian (The Patriot-News)

properties.title: Russian Strikes Target Lviv in Ukraine
properties.summary: Russia has conducted high-rise apartment building strikes on Kyiv, Kyiv, targeting four people and wounding 28 others after several missile and drone attacks. The Qatari embassy was also damaged.
properties.event_text: Armed conflicts and attacks: Russo-Ukrainian war Kyiv strikes , Russian attacks on civilians in the Russo-Ukrainian war Russian drone and missile strikes on Kyiv , Ukraine , kill four people and wound 28 others after several high-rise apartment buildings are targeted. The Qatari embassy is also damaged in the strikes. (Euronews) Russia strikes Lviv in western Ukraine with its Oreshnik intermediate-range ballistic missile , reportedly targeting a critical infrastructure site. (BBC News)

properties.title: Armed Conflicts and Attacks: Yemeni Civil War 2025
properties.summary: A Southern Transitional Council (STC) delegation in Riyadh announces the dissolution of its group following territorial losses to the Saudi-backed Yemeni government. The STC rejects the announcement, claiming it was made under duress.
properties.event_text: Armed conflicts and attacks: Yemeni civil war 2025 Southern Yemen offensive , Saudi-led intervention in the Yemeni civil war A Southern Transitional Council (STC) delegation in Riyadh announces the group's dissolution following widespread territorial losses to the Saudi -backed Yemeni government . The STC rejects the announcement, saying the announcement was made under duress. ( The New Arab )

properties.title: EU-Mercosur Trade Deal: Largest Free Trade Area
properties.summary: Twenty-one EU countries approve a trade deal with Mercosur, creating the world's largest free trade area after 25 years of negotiations. The deal is expected to be finalized in Paraguay.
properties.event_text: Business and economy: EU–Mercosur Association Agreement Twenty-one of the 27 countries of the European Union approve a trade deal with Mercosur , which will create "the world's largest free trade area " after 25 years of talks. The deal is expected to be formally signed in Paraguay in the near future. ( Politico )

properties.title: Law and crime: 2026 Cedarbluff shootings
properties.summary: At least six people are killed in a spree shootings at three locations across Cedarbluff, Mississippi, United States. A 24-year-old man is taken into custody and charged with murder.
properties.event_text: Law and crime: 2026 Cedarbluff shootings At least six people are killed in spree shootings at three locations across Cedarbluff , Mississippi , United States. A 24-year-old man is taken into custody and charged with murder . (AP via CTV News)

properties.title: Honduran Election Recount Approved
properties.summary: The Honduran National Congress approves a recount of the November 2025 election, with President Xiomara Castro's decree subsequently approved.
properties.event_text: Politics and elections: 2025 Honduran general election The National Congress of Honduras approves a recount of the votes cast in the November 2025 election, which is subsequently approved by President Xiomara Castro 's decree. (CNN in Spanish ) ( Bloomberg )
